text: What are the benefits for creators developing content in a real-time engine like Unity?
skills: Understand Unityâ€™s history and role within the industries that rely on real-time creation.

options.text: They can Easily create interactive content.
They can Iterate on design concepts faster.
They can Collaborate with team members.
They can See their final product at all times.

feedbackIncorrect: Unity is used in many industries in many different ways, but what they all have in common is the need to see, understand, or interact with physical objects in virtual spaces, making the unreal real.
